MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the WA5 postcode area of Warrington, affecting properties in Mercer Street and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.05PM to make repairs to a fault on out underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.40PM on 2nd February 2021.
